verses.name: Proverbs 11:28
verses.text: He that trusteth in his riches shall fall: but the righteous shall flourish as a branch.

verses.name: Proverbs 11:29
verses.text: He that troubleth his own house shall inherit the wind: and the fool shall be servant to the wise of heart.

verses.name: Proverbs 11:30
verses.text: The fruit of the righteous is a tree of life; and he that winneth souls is wise.

verses.name: Proverbs 11:31
verses.text: Behold, the righteous shall be recompensed in the earth: much more the wicked and the sinner.
